definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

sentences.english: As far as I know, none has been translated.
sentences.chinese: 據我所知，我的作品還沒有波斯文譯本。

sentences.english: The publisher has brought out the latest Chinese version of Pride and Prejudice.
sentences.chinese: 出版商出版了最新的《傲慢與偏見》中譯本。

sentences.english: I have read this French play via English translation.
sentences.chinese: 我已經讀過該法國戲劇的英譯本。

sentences.english: But if you want to use other translations,that's fine.
sentences.chinese: 但如果你想用其他譯本，也可以。

sentences.english: Chinese translations shall be attached to the documents and forms done in foreign languages.
sentences.chinese: 外文書件應當附中文譯本。

sentences.english: So, the version incarnating"spirit likeness" and"appearance likeness"can be ranked as the ideal …
sentences.chinese: “形神皆備”的譯本，纔是理想的譯本。

sentences.english: So, the version incarnating"spirit likeness" and"appearance likeness"can be ranked as the ideal …
sentences.chinese: “形神皆備”的譯本，纔是理想的譯本。

sentences.english: The Septuagint's rationale for ordering the books is temporal.
sentences.chinese: 希臘譯本是按時間順序排序的。

sentences.english: Literal meaning between the versions could differ, this is to preserve the emotion carried.
sentences.chinese: 爲保原文感情，中英譯本之間字面可能有出入。

sentences.english: I have never read the King James version of the Bible.
sentences.chinese: 我從未讀過詹姆士國王欽定白勺聖經英譯本。

sentences.english: Which brings us to the numerous modern translations.
sentences.chinese: 這給我們帶來許多現代譯本。

sentences.english: Chapter 5 centers on the analysis of the translation strategies supposed to be used in the three versions.
sentences.chinese: 第五章核心內容則是比較三部英譯本不同的翻譯策略。

sentences.english: Into Danish, too, it was translated shortly after its appearance.
sentences.chinese: 丹麥文譯本也是在原書問世後不久就出版了。

sentences.english: This is an especially good translation for people who speak English as a second language.
sentences.chinese: 對英語作爲第二語言的人講，這是一個尤其好的譯本。

sentences.english: It is also the first English version that claims to emphasize Chuang-tzu's philosophy.
sentences.chinese: 也是第一部強調莊子哲學的譯本。

sentences.english: Shi Xiaojing's version is faithful to the revised edition of Lao She's novel.
sentences.chinese: 施曉菁的譯本忠實地對老舍的增訂本進行了翻譯。

definition: name of a book/reputation as calligrapher
dictionary/also written 辭典|辞典[ci2 dian3]/CL:部[bu4],本[ben3]
to abridge/to cut a text down to size for publication
marginal notes/annotation/to annotate/to add comments to text
dictionary/also written 詞典|词典[ci2 dian3]/CL:本[ben3],部[bu4]
style of writing (literary style)/way of writing a character/spelling
to contrast/to compare/to place side by side for comparison (as parallel texts)/to check
